definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: He drank a tumbler of brandy.
The bridegroom quaffed down a glass of brandy.
sentences.chinese: 新郎将一杯白兰地酒一饮而尽。

sentences.english: Smith kept swigging away at the bottle of brandy .
sentences.chinese: 史密斯对著那瓶白兰地酒大口地喝个不停。

sentences.english: He poured himself a brandy and swallowed it neat.
sentences.chinese: 他给自己倒了一杯白兰地，没兑水就一饮而尽。

sentences.english: I drank a couple of brandies before going to bed and slept like a log.
sentences.chinese: 我上床前喝了几杯白兰地酒，因此就睡得很熟。

sentences.english: Blending of brandy in after appropriate containers harmonious 6 months to the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 勾兑后的白兰地在适当的容器中和谐6个月就可装瓶。

sentences.english: All sherry is made from wine fortified with brandy.
sentences.chinese: 所有的雪利酒都是在葡萄酒中加入白兰地勾兑成的。

sentences.english: David poured two brandies with an unsteady hand.
sentences.chinese: 大卫用颤抖的手倒了两杯白兰地。

sentences.english: The majority of all brandies are distilled from a fermented mash of grapes.
sentences.chinese: 大多数白兰地都从葡萄汁中蒸馏获得。

sentences.english: Brandy is poured over the pudding, then lit.
sentences.chinese: 白兰地斟在布丁上，然后点燃。

sentences.english: Brandy and Maotai are too high degress , I can't.
sentences.chinese: 白兰地和茅台度数太高了，我不行。

sentences.english: Add 1 ounce Brandy-Cranberry Syrup and mix.
sentences.chinese: 加入1盎司白兰地蔓越莓汁，混合。

sentences.english: On her way behind the counter to pour the cognac Tereza turned the volume up.
sentences.chinese: 她去柜台后面倒白兰地，顺手将音量调大了一些。

sentences.english: Sauteed Foie Gras and Chestnut, Tea Foam, Brandy Megranate Ball.
sentences.chinese: 香煎鹅肝配以栗子，菊花泡沫，白兰地石榴沙司珠。

sentences.english: A good brandy completes a fine meal.
sentences.chinese: 喝点好白兰地酒才使一顿佳肴完美无缺。

sentences.english: Baba and Rahim Khan were smoking pipes and sipping brandy when I came in.
sentences.chinese: 我进去的时候，爸爸和拉辛汗边抽大烟边喝白兰地。

definition: Cognac/brandy 白蘭地|白兰地[bai2 lan2 di4] from the Cognac region of southwest France
